data.message: There's a switch, I flip, emotions cut-off__so cold I don't even froze my butt-off. And this aint even the tip of the iceberg yet, it's like squirtin' a squirt gun in the ocean-fuck off! Other words, I aint put a dent in a game compared to the damage I've yet to do. As long as you still have feelings to hurt I'll be around long as you let me get to you. Long as I got two balls to palm, I'll be the bomb and you just a false alarm. Get scant little pissants and see if I done come along and stop your farm.
